bio:
He has rich experience in home automation and IoT product development. As a firmware developer, he worked on number of embedded software development projects. His typical projects include Raspberry Pi, Arduino, ESP32, STM32, ARM series firmware development as well as product design. He is also knowledgeable in WiFi, BLE, LoRaWan protocol.

His objective is simple—to build excellent systems that perform flawlessly.

I follow a transparent development approach that keeps my clients updated on the progress on a regular basis to ensure that the progress is in line with the expectations of the clients. I communicate with my clients on a regular basis via Emails, the Guru message, Skype, etc.

Depending on the nature and type of project I offer work on hourly or fixed cost. For the fixed cost projects, I define the deliverables for each milestone at the time of finalizing the project scope. For the hourly contracts, I mainly submit the weekly report on Monday and send an invoice for the work done in the previous week.

I also try to keep the project time to a minimum, but project business concept, work scope, and its complexity will determine the final turnaround time. Work terms are mutually discussed and accepted by both parties. The deal also includes the final proposal having clear deliveries based milestones, assumptions, support period along with standard business terms.

bio:
Who We Are :: 

The Brihaspati Infotech Private Limited is a Top-rated IT Company based in India serving global clients since 9+ years.  Over the years, we have established ourselves as acclaimed global digital service provider for Consultation, Design, Development & Marketing of Web and Mobile based applications.

What We Do :: 

We turn client's ideas into seamlessly working Web & Mobile applications. We are expertise in : 
- Website designing & development
- Mobile app development (Both native & hybrid)
- E-commerce development 
- Digital marketing 

Who We Can Help  ::

We can help out anyone who is seeking to establish an online presence or is looking to improve their existing web & mobile application.We have emerged as trusted working partners and have facilitated Startups, Growing companies, Top enterprises and Tech giants using latest technological trends and have delivered innovative solutions. 

Our Process  :: 

We set up high-performance business strategy to create, collaborate, deploy and deliver quality solutions to our global business communities. By adopting the Agile methodologies we deliver flawless and well optimized services required by the clients.

Our Vision  :: 

We envision being trusted working partners of choice for exceptional service clients. We believe in following a simple process to achieve great things. Our belief and vision to be the most reliable partners of clients worldwide. We focus on being right in everything we do, which gives us the sincerity to admit our mistakes and nerve to change.

Our Mission

Our mission is to assist clients achieve their business targets by extending innovative technology that is responsive to the changing demands of the market. We aim at attracting valuable customers, thereby expanding our client circle and thus retaining them.

We are available to work in a flexible schedule and can contribute as many hours into a project based client's need. 

We are comfortable in working on hourly as well as fixed cost projects. 

For communication we can use : Guru message system, Email, Voice calls, Skype, Basecamp, Trello, Slack etc
